definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to start a clique/to form a faction

sentences.english: Snowcapped mountain tops glisten in the strong Alpine sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔卑斯山的阳光让山头覆盖的雪景，闪亮无比。

sentences.english: They fought for a knoll some half- mile wide;
sentences.chinese: 他们为半哩宽的山头而战。

sentences.english: Let freedom ring from every hill and mole- hill of Mississippi.
sentences.chinese: 让自由从密西西比每座山头和小丘响起。

sentences.english: Each hill of the diagram building represents a mega-city.

sentences.english: The small hilltop at the back is Everest.

sentences.english: We met them at Carberry Hill.
sentences.chinese: 我们在卡贝琳山头相遇。

sentences.english: Hills in the suburban of city teem with ugly tombs.

sentences.english: Back at Ishinomaki Okawa Elementary, the grandfather on the hill hasn't budged.
sentences.chinese: 在宫城县大川小学，坐在山头的祖父还没有离开。

sentences.english: After a fierce charge, our soldiers drove the enemy from the hill-top.
sentences.chinese: 在猛烈的冲锋后，我们的士兵把敌人赶下了山头。

sentences.english: Summer, the all flowers together opens, embellishing the hilltop a slice of thriving.

sentences.chinese: 徐茂山则透露附近有一座地形险要的山头。

sentences.english: XuMaoShan is in the bag says it can take cap.

sentences.english: Here is goat's milk, but where is sassafras?
